alert.note: Alert for Gloucester; Hampton, Poquoson; Newport News; York (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 2:32PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Gloucester, and York Counties, the northwestern City of Poquoson and the City of Newport News through 330 PM EDT... At 232 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hayes, or near Gloucester Courthouse, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Newport News, Hampton, Gloucester Courthouse, Christopher Newport University, Queens Lake, Patrick Henry Field, Virginia Institute For Marine Sciences, Seaford, Gloucester Point, Hayes, Wicomico, Achilles, Lee Hall, Denbigh, Tabb, Beaconsdale, Lackey, Beulah, Camp Peary and Glass. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Gloucester; Hampton, Poquoson; Newport News; York
